data.name: SEX feat Ned
data.detailed_description:
Join the adventures of Ned Deez in the SEX Trilogy. SEX featuring Ned is the best Open World campaign experience in 2022 (Source: Trust me). This story begins when he meets the old CEO of SEX Willem Dripfoe, who is losing his CEO of SEX position after having it for 696 years. After Willem Dripfoe runs into you, Ned Deez, you must set up the transformation process so that Willem Dripfoe can give you the CEO of SEX position so it doesn't die out.

The game SEX Featuring Ned contains a great and amazing open world experience like no other game. With Ned's SEX Suit, he will be able to save the day from virgins without giving away his sexy identity. Grab a huge selection of weapons to use to defeat the virgins and become the best CEO of sex of all time. Willem Dripfoe is trusting you to restore hope to the city of SEX.

The game is singleplayer only for now but a multiplayer update is planned for the feature

Key Features
- Very Long Campaign (1000+ hours depending how long you leave your PC on)
- Ned
- Sex (PG)
- Cosmetics for Ned
- Multiple Endings.

data.short_description: Tired of being a virgin? Yeah. Me too. That's why SEX featuring Ned is the best Open World, Action Adventure, Psychological Horror, Cold War, Hentai, Romance and Masterpiece. In all seriousness, join Ned on his adventure to become the CEO of SEX in the first of 3 games in the SEX Trilogy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any/None
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run on anything

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any/None
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run on anything

  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Any

  • Graphics: Any/None
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run on anything
